description:
After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Egao no Tabidachi! Saraba Furusato Cocoyashi Mura
Partir le sourire aux lèvres ! Au revoir, Cocoyashi, mon village !
Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!
В путь с улыбкой! Прощай, родная деревня Кокояси
الإبحار مع ابتسامة! وداعًا يا موطني قرية كوكوياشي
ออกเดินทางอย่างมีความสุข!ลาก่อนหมู่บ้านโคโคยาชิ!
笑顔の旅立ち! さらば故郷ココヤシ村
